title: Looking for mid laner
body:
Looking for a mid laner for tournies and general ranked play. 

Must be around the Silver or gold rank, smart enough to give and receive constructive criticism, learn from your own mistakes and be able to stay positive throughout games.

Add 'GruntRebellion' in game if you're interested.

replies.body: Just general online tournies, thinking of one for the 21st-22nd of may for the time being.
ok sweet umm well you got room for me? i can play with you probably tomorrow when i get back home if you want to see what im like?
and i main Mid and ADC

^^^^ im interested too
DUKEo im trying to log back into client to add you again 
your request bugged for me

ok Gingninj.

Ill play tournament also
